snippet: The musician asked the artist to make paintings representing each of the songs on his new album with Crazy Horse, "Americana," which features rocked-out covers of classics like "This Land Is Your Land" and "Oh Susannah."
abstract: The musician asked the artist to make paintings representing each of the songs on his new album with Crazy Horse, "Americana," which features rocked-out covers of classics like "This Land Is Your Land" and "Oh Susannah."

headline.main: Shepard Fairey Paints Neil Young's New Songs
